title: Cross-Facility Formulary Synchronization

decision_options.name: Emergency formulary push to Community
decision_options.tradeoff: 4-hour implementation; requires pharmacy downtime at Community
decision_options.success_metric: All facilities on same formulary version; no dispensing conflicts

decision_options.name: Revert General to old formulary
decision_options.tradeoff: Disrupts 450-bed facility; patients already on new agent need transition
decision_options.success_metric: Uniform formulary across system; but reversal introduces new clinical risk

decision_options.name: Manual bridge protocol for transfer patients + systemic sync
decision_options.tradeoff: Labor-intensive short-term; preserves both facilities' current operations
decision_options.success_metric: Zero formulary conflicts at transfer; sync verified within 24h

patch_sequence.action: Deploy manual bridge protocol for all inter-facility transfers
patch_sequence.verification: Transfer checklist includes formulary reconciliation; pharmacy sign-off
patch_sequence.rollback: Revert to pre-transfer medication hold protocol

patch_sequence.action: Emergency formulary push to Community pharmacy system
patch_sequence.verification: S-RX-001 version match confirmed at all facilities; test dispensing verified

patch_sequence.action: Add real-time formulary sync verification to EHR interface engine
patch_sequence.verification: Sync heartbeat active; alert on version mismatch > 1 hour
patch_sequence.rollback: Disable sync check; revert to manual verification schedule

closure_conditions: All facilities on identical formulary version
No open medication safety events linked to formulary mismatch
